Bright theme for Shower

Follow @shower_me for support and updates

To see Bright theme for Shower in action:

  • Open shwr.me/shower/themes/bright
  • Click any slide to enter presentation mode
  • Use arrow keys or presenter remote to navigate
  • Press Esc to exit presentation mode

Part of Shower presentation template. See Wiki for more information how to use Shower.
